55470.name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Legion of the Damned Armour Set
55470.description: Silent Warriors whose black armour is adorned with chilling images of bone and fire the Legion of Damned appear only in times of greatest need and with chill precion, turn disaster into victory.  Considered by some to be an extension of the Emperor's superhuman will, an eery glow surrounds their armour and their weapons discharge flaming projectiles that can pierce the strongest armour.
55470.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
